alert.note: Alert for Chisos Basin; Crane; Lower Brewster County; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Reagan; Reeves County Plains; Terrell; Upton; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 02 at 3:45AM CDT until April 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 8% OR LESS, 20FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO AND MOST OF WEST TEXAS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 12% OR LESS, 20FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR WEST TEXAS AND SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 12% OR LESS, 20FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER... * AFFECTED AREA...Ward, Crane, Upton, Reagan, Pecos, Terrell, Reeves County Plains, Chisos Basin, Presidio Valley and Lower Brewster County. * TIMING...Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * WINDS...West 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 5 percent. * RFTI...8 or extreme. * IMPACTS...Avoid the use of open flames or any activities that may generate sparks. Accidental ignitions will have the potential to grow quickly into dangerous wind-driven wildfires.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Chisos Basin; Crane; Lower Brewster County; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Reagan; Reeves County Plains; Terrell; Upton; Ward
